rev.comment: grammar mistake: mistake in comma usage in compound noun, and division of paragraph into two paragraphs; the latter is unsure of; please revert if found wrong
even more grammar mistakes: comma should not be used in compound verb, and a minor mistake
more grammar mistakes: consistency should remain in paranthesis
yet even another grammar mistake (this one involving comma usage)
grammar mistakes including comma usage and adverb-adjective hyphen
grammar mistake: hyphen should not be used between an adverb describing an adjective
OK, I see the ambiguity; but it needs to be "that" not "which"
